snippet: Israel, citing “the present diplomatic-security situation,” refuses to let the Olympic athlete Nader al-Masri cross the country to compete in a marathon in Bethlehem.
abstract: Israeli government, citing security concerns, refuses to let Gazan marathon runner Nader al-Masri travel through Israel to Bethlehem, in the West Bank, to compete in the Palestine Marathon.
lead_paragraph: Israel, citing “the present diplomatic-security situation,” refuses to let the Olympic athlete Nader al-Masri cross the country to compete in a marathon in Bethlehem.

headline.main: Mideast Tensions Sideline a Gazan Marathon Runner
headline.print_headline: Mideast Tensions Sideline a Gazan Marathon Runner
